Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: (Hope I don’t need one after this mission.)

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: You seem to be interested in my cane, dear.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I must admit, it is indeed a beautiful cane.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: When your leg doesn't work as well as before,

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: having a beautiful cane adds a touch of elegance to each step.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Thanks to this cane, I can still bring myself to wherever I need to.

Dialogues.Dialogue: If there is anything I can do to make your journey more comfortable, please let me know right away. >

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: That is good to know, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Martha_Sad
Speaker.line1: It was... a tragic accident, you know.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Apart from my injury, my back has also been acting up lately.
Speaker.line2: It does make traveling for long periods quite challenging.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: However, this time is different; it's very important.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: The excitement is getting the best of me.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line2: It looks like the one from that famous little shop,
Speaker.line3: back in the National Day celebration.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: I couldn’t buy it as it sold out, but I bet yours will taste as good.
